author: Suzy Khimm and Laura Strickler
title: As nursing home deaths skyrocket, House Dems urge admin to track cases
description: A group of House Democrats is urging the Trump administration to track and publicly report coronavirus infections in nursing homes, as deaths from the virus are skyrocketing in long-term care facilities around the country.
content:
A group of House Democrats is urging the Trump administration to track and publicly report coronavirus infections in nursing homes, as deaths from the virus are skyrocketing in long-term care facilities around the country.
